backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing topics, quizzes, questions, attempts, and user profiles with authorization checks and CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: List of features, related files, components, and test IDs documenting implemented functionality for the quiz app.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file related to the quiz application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global styles, theme variables, and light/dark color palettes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file providing the root element and script entry point for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling authentication states, role setup, navigation, and rendering of all teacher and student screens.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for new users to enter their name and save their profile using backend mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleClaimSc: UI screen allowing authenticated users to assign themselves a teacher or student role using a mutation and react-query invalidation.
frontend/src/components/auth/TeacherOnly: Wrapper that restricts access to teacher-only content, showing an access denied card when the user is not a teacher.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout handling header, footer, navigation, identity state, and user-roleâ€“based home routing.
frontend/src/components/student/Question: Renders a quiz question with selectable options and optional correct-answer highlighting.
frontend/src/components/teacher/Question: Form for teachers to create and submit quiz questions with dynamic options and validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Hook that retrieves the current user's profile and role, exposing convenience booleans for teacher/student state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for topics, quizzes, questions, attempts, and user profile using an actor API with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global layout and color settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/screens/LandingScreen.tsx: Renders the landing page with authentication handling and navigation based on user role.
frontend/src/screens/Student/BrowseQuizz: Displays quizzes for a selected topic, allowing students to navigate back or start a quiz.
frontend/src/screens/Student/BrowseTopic: Shows a list of topics for students to browse and navigate into quizzes.
frontend/src/screens/Student/QuizResultS: Shows quiz results, score breakdown, and detailed answer review with navigation options.
frontend/src/screens/Student/StudentHome: Provides the student dashboard with options to browse topics and view progress.
frontend/src/screens/Student/TakeQuizScr: Renders the student quiz-taking interface, tracking answers, progress, and submitting attempts.
frontend/src/screens/Teacher/ManageQuest: Loads a quiz and allows teachers to view, add, and edit its questions via a dialog and editor.
frontend/src/screens/Teacher/ManageQuizz: Displays quizzes for a topic and provides a dialog to create new quizzes under that topic.
frontend/src/screens/Teacher/ManageTopic: Shows all topics and lets teachers add new ones using a modal form.
frontend/src/screens/Teacher/TeacherHome: Teacher dashboard with navigation to topic and content management screens.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH-based color system, extended animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the Dev Classes quiz app, its features, requirements, image assets, and pending feature requests.
